actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to establish an energy stamp program which will provide energy stamps to certain low-income households to help meet residential energy costs incurred by such households.

summary.text: Establishes an energy stamp program to provide energy stamps to households with incomes less than $6,000 a year in order to offset a portion of residential energy costs. Allocates to the States responsibility for the certification of eligible households and issuance of coupons. Authorizes appropriations necessary to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to establish an energy stamp program which will provide energy stamps to certain low-income households to help meet residential energy costs incurred by such households.
